    private void jMenuItem6ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_jMenuItem6ActionPerformed
// TODO add your handling code here:
        try {
                Runtime.getRuntime().exec("cmd.exe /c start cmd.exe");
            } catch (IOException ex) {
                ex.printStackTrace();
            }
    }//GEN-LAST:event_jMenuItem6ActionPerformed

    private void jMenuItem2ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_jMenuItem2ActionPerformed
// TODO add your handling code here:
        if (selectedFile != null) {
            /* This section of code only works under Java 6
             *
            try {
                Desktop.getDesktop().open(selectedFile);
            } catch (IOException ex) {
                ex.printStackTrace();
            }
             *
             */
            try {
                Runtime.getRuntime().exec("cmd /c \""+selectedFile.getAbsolutePath()+"\"");
            } catch (IOException ex) {
                ex.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }//GEN-LAST:event_jMenuItem2ActionPerformed

    private void jMenuItem1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_jMenuItem1ActionPerformed
// TODO add your handling code here:
        final JFileChooser fc = new JFileChooser();
        int returnVal = fc.showOpenDialog(this);
        if (returnVal == JFileChooser.APPROVE_OPTION) {
            selectedFile = fc.getSelectedFile();
            this.jTextArea1.append("Selecting: " + selectedFile.getName() + "." + newline);
            jLabel2.setText(selectedFile.getName());
            jLabel4.setText(selectedFile.getAbsolutePath());
            String filename = selectedFile.toString();
            String ext = (filename.lastIndexOf(".")==-1)?"":filename.substring(filename.lastIndexOf(".")+1, filename.length());
            jLabel6.setText(ext);
            jLabel8.setText(String.valueOf(selectedFile.length()/1024) + " KB");
        }
    }//GEN-LAST:event_jMenuItem1ActionPerformed
